item.title: Do you know Java: Helpful NullPointerExceptions
item.description: Java 14 has brought a helpful feature with that we can get information about the source of the raised NullPointerException NullPointerException is not very friendly and can occur anywhere. All the placed where we don’t want it to be. In this post I will show you how to track down its source. The following source code is given: String value = null; System.out.println(value.length()); Pre Java 14 Era The good old error message is the following:
